Notes:
* Unity: on Thursday, and uploading other changes as much as possible before Thursday to get more testing (see w/kamstrup things like places and the ZG gio module)
* Appmenu, indicator & gtk: no FF exception so far
* IDO update: part is for sound; on/off toggle
* indicator-sound: UI polishing + mpris spec updated
* rb patch update for mprisv2
* amarok patch for mprisv2 compatibility
* indicator-network: new weekly release
* indicator-me: header change to indicate to which accounts a message will be sent
